ISSUE.TITLE: "base_choices" is not working in custom field choice bulk import
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Deployment Type Self-hosted ### NetBox Version v4.2.6 ### Python Version 3.11 ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Click in "Bulk import" in "Custom Field Choices" 2. Set data to: ``` --- name: Choices description: order_alphabetically: False base_choices: ISO_3166 extra_choices: ``` 3. Set format to `YAML` 4. Click "Submit" button ### Expected Behavior A new custom field choice should have been created with the selected base choices. ### Observed Behavior An error "Must define base or extra choices" was raised

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Closes #19208: Ignore beta releases when fetching latest release tag

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixes #19166: Fix bulk import support for base_choices
Fixes #19166: Fix bulk import support for base_choices (#19257)
